hero.title: Multilingual Freelancer Blog
hero.description: This is a multilingual personal blog system designed for freelance programmers, supporting multiple language interfaces and content.

features.title: Featured Functions
features.description: Explore the powerful features of this multilingual blog system

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.subtitle: Support for multiple language interfaces and content
multilingual.description: The system supports five languages: English, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, and French, allowing you to serve global markets.

projects.title: Project Showcase
projects.subtitle: Showcase your skills and projects
projects.description: Create beautiful project showcase pages, upload multiple images, add project descriptions, tech stack tags, and project links.

jobInvites.title: Job Invitations
jobInvites.subtitle: Receive job invitations from potential clients
jobInvites.description: Receive job invitations and messages through the built-in contact form, the system will automatically detect message language and provide translation options.

demo.title: Interactive Demo
demo.description: Try clicking the button below to experience the interaction

counter.title: Counter Demo
counter.subtitle: Click the button to increase the count
